text: Besaka agi'a palana karana vale adami te auratam. Ate imana li'a'una vale adami te auratam ate cage raha te calana vale avami te auratam. Ate sabara karana vale adami te auratam. Ate alaha da dara rakhana vale adami te auratam. Ate dana dena vale adami te auratam. Ate roza rakhana vale adami te auratam. Ate apane gupata agam di rakhi'a karana vale adami te auratam. Ate alaha nu vadha to vadha yada karana vale adami te auratam. Inham la'i' alaha ne mu'afi ate vada badala ti'ara kara rakhi'a hai
